value: To support students' career development and advice, employer engagement, and core skills development.
To support students' study skills development or provide more in-depth help with writing assignment: from planning and research to developing strong arguments and language.
To review a page of students' writing and give quick feedback on common errors students' may have made in their writing: grammar, vocabulary, sentence structure or punctuation.
asynchronous materials for students to use at their own time, to support, career development and advice, employer engagement, and core skills development.
To support student's learning with academic skills workshops around the themes: Academic English, Successful Study, Writing at University, Finding Information
To support students with long term medical conditions, disability, learning difficulties or general wellbeing matters
To develop the academic language and skills students will need to succeed in their studies
